mapper.select: select doc_box_no,doc_box_name,db.emp_no,doc_box_regdate from doc_box db join emp e on db.emp_no = e.emp_no where db.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select dm.doc_no,doc_title,doc_con_period from doc d join doc_management dm on d.doc_no = dm.doc_no where dm.doc_box_no = #{doc_box_no}
select emp_name from emp where emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.update: update doc_box set doc_box_name=#{doc_box_name} where doc_box_no=#{doc_box_no}
update doc set doc_deldate = SYSDATE where doc_no = #{doc_no}
